long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to receive notifications about any events from your JIRA速 activity stream and follow issues from your projects.

Also you can choose what types of events you want to be notified of, set the interval of notifications and customize issue list popup to make your experience better.
